/**
 * @fileOverview
 <h2>About Atomic Plugins</h2>
 <p>Atomic Plugins provide an elegant and minimalist API and are designed with portability in mind from the beginning. Framework dependencies are avoided by design so the plugins can run on any platform and can be integrated with any app framework or game engine.
 <br/><p>You can contribute and help to create more awesome plugins. </p>
 <h3>Atomic Plugins repositories</h3>
 <p>This is a list of all the Atomic Plugins available.</p> 
 <ul>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/CocoonIO/cocoon-canvasplus">Canvas+ legacies</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/ludei/atomic-plugins-ads">Atomic Plugins Ads</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/ludei/atomic-plugins-inapps">Atomic Plugins In-App Purchases</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/ludei/atomic-plugins-social">Atomic Plugins Social integration</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/ludei/atomic-plugins-share">Atomic Plugins Share</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/ludei/atomic-plugins-facebook/">Atomic Plugins Facebook</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/ludei/atomic-plugins-gamecenter/">Atomic Plugins Game Center</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/ludei/atomic-plugins-googleplaygames/">Atomic Plugins Google Play Games</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/ludei/atomic-plugins-notifications">Atomic Plugins Notifications</a></li>
 <li><a href="https://github.com/ludei/atomic-plugins-multiplayer">Atomic Plugins Multiplayer</a></li>
 </ul>
 <h3>Documentation</h3>
 <p>Select the specific namespace below to open the relevant documentation section:</p>
 <ul>

 <li><a href="http://ludei.github.io/atomic-plugins-docs/dist/doc/js/Cocoon.Notification.html">Notifications</a></li>
 <li><a href="http://ludei.github.io/atomic-plugins-docs/dist/doc/js/Cocoon.Notification.Local.html">Local Notifications</a></li>
